description: This table contains the adjustment transactions applied to liability buckets.

columns.name: BUCKET_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the bucket record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ADJUSTMENT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the adjustment transaction that is associated with this liability bucket.

columns.name: HSP_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital account to which the liability bucket is linked.
